plot: When socialite/businesswoman Paris goes missing, her boyfriend concocts a "My Fair Lady"-esque plot to use identical-looking florist Qin Xin to keep Paris' uncle from gaining control of the company until Paris can be found.
title: Ying zi ai ren
plot_es: When socialite/businesswoman Paris goes missing, her boyfriend concocts a "My Fair Lady"-esque plot to use identical-looking florist Qin Xin to keep Paris' uncle from gaining control of the company until Paris can be found.
plot_en: When socialite/businesswoman Paris goes missing, her boyfriend concocts a "My Fair Lady"-esque plot to use identical-looking florist Qin Xin to keep Paris' uncle from gaining control of the company until Paris can be found.
